WorkItem.Description: Bibword styles seem to cause Word for Mac 2016 to crash when switching to a bibword style (e.g. IEEE). Installed as per previous versions by copying all xml files to Microsoft Word 2016.app->Content->Resources->Style.

Comments.Message:
Word also crashes on my Mac (after a short time with a document with IEEE reference style). Only tested with "IEEE reference.xsl"
Word: 15.13.1

I confirm the bag on Word for Mac 2016 
Word 15.14

I was able to get the styles installed. It is a very different location from previous versions of Word for Mac.
